title: Polymorphic Shape Areas
description:
Create:
1. Shape class with getArea() returning 0.0
2. Circle class with radius field, overriding getArea() to return π * r²
3. Rectangle class with width and height, overriding getArea() to return width * height
Use Math.PI for π

testCases.description:
Circle c = new Circle(5.0);
return Math.abs(c.getArea() - 78.54) < 0.1;

Rectangle r = new Rectangle(4, 5);
return r.getArea();

Shape s = new Circle(10.0);
return s.getArea() > 300.0 && s.getArea() < 320.0;
